CREATE TABLE Aml_ModelParam (paramCode VARCHAR(45) NOT NULL,paramName VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL,paramDes VARCHAR(2000),paramValue VARCHAR(2000),susModelCodes VARCHAR(2000),largeModelCodes VARCHAR(2000),PRIMARY KEY (paramCode));
